TopicTitle: Is there a mod to reverse control surface responses?

Articles.Content: I have recently designed a craft and it has the issue of W (pitch down) suddenly is pitch up and S (pitch up) is suddenly pitch down. So is there a mod that can reverse this for me? Thanks for the help.

@ZooNamedGames Is the issue only with that craft? If so, try setting the control surface authority to the opposite of the number you have already. If, for example, it is 100, then set it to -100.

If the problem applies to all craft, then check the settings, more specifically the controls section. Possibly, W is set to pitch up and S is set to pitch down. Then, set W to pitch down and S to pitch up. If it is correct, then you can do the opposite.
